Subject: Converge

From: KSLawdogg@...

Dark One/Sixshot/Chordate:




Dark One turned to the side 180 degrees so his wings were pointing towards 
the sky and ground, not left and right.  He returned fire as Hot Rod's shots 
passed by harmlessly with 10 rapid laser blasts, pulling up and heading back 
the way he came.  He activated his comm. unit.

"All Alliance members, converge at Sector 84-S and prepare for battle."

Sixshot barrel rolled, heading for the coordinates given to him by Sixshot.

---

Chordate smiled as Sixshot and Dark One were only a dozen meters from firing 
range, but cursed loudly as they turned back.  They'd also sent out a 
transmission, but the Cybertronian Fire's computer couldn't crack it.

He pressed a few buttons, lowering the shields to the Cybertronian Fire, but 
keeping all weapons up.
